mapper.select: select bno, title, content, color, to_char(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate, to_char(enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate from tb_event where bno > 0
mapper.insert: insert into tb_event (bno, title, content, color, startdate, enddate) values (seq_tb_event.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{color}, sysdate, sysdate)
